ai-tha-ap468:1.1_0: “The Buddha is the best of head:
ai-tha-ap468:1.2_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap468:1.4_0: I went out of my resort.
ai-tha-ap468:2.1_0: I’ve seen fruits in the fruit,
ai-tha-ap468:2.4_0: took a fruit from a keyhole.
ai-tha-ap468:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap468:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap468:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap468:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṭaka.
ai-tha-ap468:8.1_0: he took the opportunity to the Elders.
